title: Instructional Knowledge Sharing Design Using Educational Modeling Language

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and learning scenario development experience
context.additional_context: Practitioners share educational modeling languages and pedagogical case studies through microlearning modules in mobile environments, strengthening practical application skills via project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can describe the structural characteristics of Educational Modeling Language (EML) and derive a learning scenario design process in connection with the DIN pedagogical object model.
Learners can document pedagogical context and experiential information in a structured format to operate a knowledge-sharing system.
Learners can analyze microlearning-based instructional methods in mobile environments and apply them to project-based assessment systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
